increaseTrades() - Method in interface model.contract.IPlayer
 
increaseTrades() - Method in class model.Player
reduces the number of trades for card exchange
initGame() - Method in class model.GameManager
Initialize the game steps Step 1: Add players and give each them armies according to the rules Step 2: Randomly allocate the countries in the map Step 3: Allocate initial armies according to the rules Step 4: Place armies onto territories in turn
initPlayers() - Method in class model.GameManager
this method add players to the game it uses the number which is given while creating game instance.
